adminTime.label: Day per week managers lose to admin and stepping in for work their team could own.

firefight.label: Manager hours lost each week firefighting culture conflicts.

ping.label: Minutes between digital pings during the workday.

disengageCost.label: Trillion dollars disengagement drains globally every year.

burnoutQuit.label: Times more likely burned-out staff will quit.

replaceLeader.label: Percent of salary it costs to replace a key leader.
